{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3565630,"name":"","username":"actinium226","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/a/46a35a/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-03-22T23:35:46.785Z","cooked":"

The robot comes up as this strange shape with this elongated thing (see right side of image). I looked at the docs but they make no mention of the shape, in fact the wpilib docs sort of make passing reference to shuffleboard and then talk about Glass and another thing which we don’t use.

Anyway, does anyone know if there’s a way to change that shape?

2025_shuffleboard_robot_image1433×689 159 KB

That’s a formula car XD

There’s no way to change the image from what I’ve seen, only the size. What I can recommend here is using Elastic instead of Shuffleboard. You don’t have to change any of your code, just download and open Elastic. You may have to drag and drop your widgets onto the screen, but it’s a two minute switch. There are fewer bugs, nicer UI, and the robot on the field is actually a square that you can change the size of.
